mapper.select: SELECT NNO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , REGDATE , NIMG , NTHUMBIMG FROM NOTICE WHERE NNO = #{nno}

SELECT NNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT FROM ( SELECT NNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY NNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(NNO) FROM NOTICE, MEMBER WHERE 1=1
AND NNO > 0
